If these episodes don't work, try upading your codec packs on your PC. Bear in mind that even after installing new ones, sometimes you need to 'register' the .dll files etc. by using typing in the following on the command prompt (CMD from the 'run' menu): regsrvr.exe DLLname.DLL or something similar.
